Factsheet

Developer:
Four Eyed Cat
Based in Purmerend, the Netherlands

Release date:
July 2014

Platforms:
iOS

Website:
kickingballsgame.com

Regular Price:

USD$0.99

Description

In Kicking Balls you play as a little girl from the favelas in Brazil who wants to become a football superstar. The player controls the character by simply turning her like a table football figure and then kick a ball into the goal. The player also has to aim for the coins to collect them. Can you become the World Champion? Grab your cleats and get ready to kick some balls.

History

Kicking Balls started out as an simple test case. A prototype was created to test the ease of use and the performance of the Chipmunk2D package for Unity3D. The mechanics of the prototype turned out to be so much fun that development of the ongoing project at that time was dropped and work started to turn the prototype into a full game.

Features

  • 48 Challenging levels
  • Colorful vector art graphics
  • Play as a girl
  • Maniplate balls with your finger

About Four Eyed Cat

Boilerplate
Four Eyed Cat is a one man studio run by Ashwin Lassay, with the goal to bring joy and excitement to people's lives with small mobile games.
